name: Poco Picante Salsa
description: Chop up some tomatoes, add this delicious blend of onions, garlic, and chilies and you’ve got the most amazingly fresh, homemade salsa. With 165 mg less sodium and 40% less expensive per serving than some well-known store-bought versions, it’s the perfect condiment for your next Mexican-inspired meal.
preparation: Add salsa mix to tomatoes. Add lime juice and cilantro, if desired. Let stand 10 min before serving.
tips: For a milder salsa, start with 1 tbsp of salsa mix. Want more spice? Add in 1 tsp Chili Flakes & Garlic Topper or Carne Asada Marinade Mix.
